sent.orig: There was a clearer distinction of ranks and a dimmer distinction of parties.
sent.trans: 等级壁垒还相当森严，而党派的壁垒却不太分明。

sent.orig: Is the distinction with Chinese meal and the most essential-food the distinction of raw material? Either.
sent.trans: 中餐与西餐最根本的区别是原料的区别吗？不是。

sent.orig: Static and dynamic library of distinction, and the procedure call link static and dynamic library distinction.
sent.trans: 动态链接库程序的编写。静态库与动态库的区别，以及调用程序在链接静态库和动态库时的区别。

sent.orig: He is a player of real distinction.
sent.trans: 他是真正卓越的运动员。

sent.orig: Philosophers did not use to make a distinction between arts and science.
sent.trans: 哲学家过去习惯不把艺术和科学区别开来。
